segments.text: I see the open window letting in light.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden path winds neatly between bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, the sink faucet runs full blast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water spills over in a steady stream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman holds a plate, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's turned away from the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy climbs the stool toward the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is right there, open.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His reach is awkward, stool tipping slightly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below him has her arm up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're coordinating this cookie heist quietly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's unexpected how bold they are.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the serene outside is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect such mischief in a simple kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle reflects the window's glow oddly.
segments.speaker: PAR
